Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Bucks have struggled to a 1-5 record to start the season, currently sporting the worst record in the Eastern Conference.
Cleveland Cavaliers are atop the East and are one of just two remaining undefeated teams across the league.
This will be the second consecutive meeting between the Bucks and Cavaliers.
Donovan Mitchell played hero over the weekend, scoring a go-ahead basket with 0.1 seconds left to give Cleveland a 114-113 win on Saturday night.
The Cavaliers are 7.5-point home favorites as of Monday morning. The total is set at 228.
